com.example.progetto.service

Class PaymentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.progetto.service.PaymentService

  • @Service
public class PaymentService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements various functions called by the controller, in fact the main features of our program are coded here, the Service of Spring boot contains the business logic of the application.

      • statistics

        public DataStatistics statistics(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                 java.util.Vector<Payment> sample)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Parameters:
        fieldName - string representing a field, calculation are performed for every object on their specific attributes that match this string
        sample - vector of a objects representing each row of the CSV
        Returns:
        object of type DataStatistics that encapsulates results of calculation performed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - message for the user that covers incorrect input specified for statistics on period

      • filter

        public java.util.Vector<Payment> filter(java.util.Vector<Payment> payments,
                                        DataFiltering param)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        This method implements the general filter logic used also to count the number of occurrences.
        Parameters:
        payments - Vector of payments representing the pool of object to filter
        param - object that structures the specific filter parameters to use
        Returns:
        a vector of payments where each row respects filter parameters specified
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - message for the user that covers incorrect input specified for statistics on period

      • check

        public static boolean check(java.lang.Object paymentValue,
                            java.lang.String operator,
                            java.lang.Object inputValue)
        Parameters:
        paymentValue - Object containing a value extracted with the getter method from a row object. This is the first operand for the conditional comparision.
        operator - represent the operator to apply for the conditional comparison
        inputValue - represent the second operand for the conditional comparison specified by the user in the JSON body
        Returns:
        boolean stating if the condition is respected or not

      • getStartEnd

        private java.lang.String[] getStartEnd(java.lang.Object paymentValue)
        This function is used when we have to deal with the Programming Period.
        Parameters:
        paymentValue - object containing a value of Period extracted with the getter method from a row object.
        Returns:
        an array of string representing the Start and the End of the of the Period as separated values.

      • calculate

        private java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> calculate(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> store)
        This function implements the math operation needed to get the statistics requested
        Parameters:
        store - vector representing the poll of values from which get the statistics
        Returns:
        vector of values of different types representing the results of the operations performed
